title: Parallels Desktop Updater Race Condition Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Parallels Desktop. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the update machanism. The issue results from the lack of proper locking when performing operations on an object. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code in the context of root.
addtionnal_details: Parallels has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://kb.parallels.com/125013
timeline:
2022-03-09 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2022-06-30 - Coordinated public release of advisory
